name: Intergalactic Frosting Fight!
description:
Every baker's worst nightmare! Unfrosted cupcakes! Deal damage with your piping bag space ship and try to vanquish all of those pesky cupcakes!

Project created as part of CAS117:  Games and Interactivity at Michigan State University.  This game was created using Unity. I also used Autodesk Sketchbook for creating digital assets, like the piping bag spaceship. 

Created By: Erin Sawyer
